user_query: I want to surprise my partner with a romantic dinner. Can you suggest a recipe that includes seafood as the main ingredient? Also, provide the nutritional analysis for the recipe and calculate the carbon footprint of using clean hydro energy for cooking.

TaskList.description: Search for a romantic seafood recipe that can be prepared for dinner.
Provide a nutritional analysis for the suggested seafood recipe.
TaskList.dependency: Step 1 needs to be completed before this step.

TaskList.description: Calculate the carbon footprint of using clean hydro energy for cooking the seafood recipe.
TaskList.dependency: Step 2 needs to be completed before this step.
